amendment.description: To amend title 18 of the United States Code and other provisions of law to strengthen provisions of the Violence Against Women Act and improve justice for crime victims.

action.text: Amendment SA 2086 proposed by Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 2093.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2086, under the order of 4/26/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 85.
